title: When running RVIZ tutorial, there is an issue with the lidar

content.raw:
I was following the RVIZ Visualization tutorial but I am getting this when i run the localization\_example launch file

‌

```
SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /rosdistro: melodic
 * /rosversion: 1.14.5
 * /wamv/rob_st_pub/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/base_link_frame: wamv/base_link
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0: /wamv/sensors/imu...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_config: [False, False, Fa...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_remove_gravitational_acceleration: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/map_frame: map
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0: /wamv/robot_local...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_config: [True, True, True...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/publish_tf: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/sensor_timeout: 2.0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/smooth_lagged_data: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/two_d_mode: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/world_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/broadcast_utm_transform: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/datum: [21.30996, -157.8...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/magnetic_declination_radians: 0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/publish_filtered_gps: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/use_odometry_yaw: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/wait_for_datum: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/yaw_offset: 0

NODES
  /wamv/
    rob_st_pub (robot_state_publisher/robot_state_publisher)
  /wamv/robot_localization/
    ekf_localization (robot_localization/ekf_localization_node)
    navsat_transform_node (robot_localization/navsat_transform_node)

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

process[wamv/rob_st_pub-1]: started with pid [28019]
process[wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization-2]: started with pid [28020]
process[wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node-3]: started with pid [28021]
[ INFO] [1586938296.221095324]: Waiting for valid clock time...
[ WARN] [1586938296.419463825, 4.750000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 4.75
[ WARN] [1586938296.420346868, 4.751000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 4.7343333330000003656
[ INFO] [1586938296.423336602, 4.754000000]: Valid clock time received. Starting node.
[ INFO] [1586938296.429349504, 4.760000000]: Datum (latitude, longitude, altitude) is (21.309960, -157.890100, 0.000000)
[ INFO] [1586938296.429373975, 4.760000000]: Datum UTM coordinate is (615116.100362, 2356857.621317)
[ INFO] [1586938296.429398980, 4.760000000]: Initial odometry pose is Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ INFO] [1586938296.449062582, 4.780000000]: Corrected for magnetic declination of 0.000000, user-specified offset of 0.000000 and meridian convergence of 0.007041. Transform heading factor is now 0.007041
[ INFO] [1586938296.449117712, 4.780000000]: Transform world frame pose is: Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ INFO] [1586938296.449178137, 4.780000000]: World frame->utm transform is Origin: (-631694.38578621379565 -2352468.4624987612478 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, 0, -0.0070405899472914101195)

[ WARN] [1586938296.469491573, 4.800000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist. 

[ WARN] [1586938298.471959678, 6.800000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist. 
```

In RVIZ, the silouhette of the WAM-V is shown with errors under imu and pointcloud2.
content.html:
I was following the RVIZ Visualization tutorial but I am getting this when i run the localization_example launch file

‌

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /rosdistro: melodic
 * /rosversion: 1.14.5
 * /wamv/rob_st_pub/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/base_link_frame: wamv/base_link
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0: /wamv/sensors/imu...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_config: [False, False, Fa...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_remove_gravitational_acceleration: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/map_frame: map
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0: /wamv/robot_local...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_config: [True, True, True...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/publish_tf: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/sensor_timeout: 2.0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/smooth_lagged_data: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/two_d_mode: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/world_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/broadcast_utm_transform: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/datum: [21.30996, -157.8...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/magnetic_declination_radians: 0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/publish_filtered_gps: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/use_odometry_yaw: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/wait_for_datum: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/yaw_offset: 0

NODES
  /wamv/
    rob_st_pub (robot_state_publisher/robot_state_publisher)
  /wamv/robot_localization/
    ekf_localization (robot_localization/ekf_localization_node)
    navsat_transform_node (robot_localization/navsat_transform_node)

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

process[wamv/rob_st_pub-1]: started with pid [28019]
process[wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization-2]: started with pid [28020]
process[wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node-3]: started with pid [28021]
[ INFO] [1586938296.221095324]: Waiting for valid clock time...
[ WARN] [1586938296.419463825, 4.750000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 4.75
[ WARN] [1586938296.420346868, 4.751000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 4.7343333330000003656
[ INFO] [1586938296.423336602, 4.754000000]: Valid clock time received. Starting node.
[ INFO] [1586938296.429349504, 4.760000000]: Datum (latitude, longitude, altitude) is (21.309960, -157.890100, 0.000000)

Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ INFO] [1586938296.449062582, 4.780000000]: Corrected for magnetic declination of 0.000000, user-specified offset of 0.000000 and meridian convergence of 0.007041. Transform heading factor is now 0.007041
[ INFO] [1586938296.449117712, 4.780000000]: Transform world frame pose is: Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ INFO] [1586938296.449178137, 4.780000000]: World frame->utm transform is Origin: (-631694.38578621379565 -2352468.4624987612478 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, 0, -0.0070405899472914101195)

[ WARN] [1586938296.469491573, 4.800000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist.
